title: Changelog & Update System
description: Implemented a new system to keep you up to date with the latest improvements.

changes.title: Changelog Page
changes.description: View a history of all updates and improvements made to the application.

changes.title: Update Notifications
changes.description: Receive instant notifications when a new version of the app is available, with a quick refresh option.

title: Evaluation System Enhancements
description: Improved the evaluation workflow with better notifications and filtering.

changes.title: Acknowledgment Notifications
changes.description: Evaluators now receive notifications when their evaluation is acknowledged.

changes.title: Evaluation Filtering & Search
changes.description: Filter evaluations by type, status, and search by subject name.

changes.title: Performance Trends Chart
changes.description: Visual line chart showing evaluation rating history over time.

title: Efficiency Metrics & Stakeholder UX
description: Enhanced project efficiency calculations and stakeholder user experience.

changes.title: Comprehensive Efficiency Score
changes.description: Project efficiency now calculated using three key metrics: Productivity Gain, Delivery Efficiency, and Time Efficiency.
